short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension for https://olehc.com/. It is used for sharing your screen with others.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Extension is to be used by the Trainer and Students who have subscribed the services of OLEHC. This provide screen sharing facilities.
